item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:61 Chances: CNH Industrial NV is a highly diversified equipment and services company with a strong presence in the farming and construction industries. The company has a track record of developing, manufacturing, and distributing a full line of farm machinery and construction equipment, including innovative and award-winning products.
